title: `BuildEnvironmentHelper_Tests` should test x64 scenarios too
body:
Following https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/6683/commits/e020ff1202e9f11b1a39de19a27047675f063476, most of tests in `BuildEnvironmentHelper_Tests` are only for x86 scenarios.

x64 scenarios remain untested.

Consider writing the tests for x64 scenarios and ensure that `BuildEnvironment` is functioning correctly with those scenarios.
